projects.title: Full-Stack Weather App
projects.description: Dynamic weather app with animations, React Icons, Axios for API fetching, and optimized state management.

projects.title: Full-Stack Todo App
projects.description: Full-stack todo app using Node.js, Express, and EJS. Offers efficient task management with dynamic rendering.

projects.title: Full-Stack Blog App
projects.description: Full-stack Next.js blog app for easy sharing of daily life anecdotes. Create, edit, and delete posts seamlessly.

projects.title: Sarad's To Do App
projects.description: A To-Do app with Tailwind CSS, featuring smooth animations, image, title, description, and two functional buttons.

projects.title: College Site
projects.description: College site providing course details, faculty information, and event updates. Developed with a responsive design.
